name: Not That Sad online
description:
Not That Sad online is a First Person Shooter that can be played and hosted only in a Local Area Network. Only one session per IP address. To join another session on the same network you need to type in the host's IP address.

You can basically shoot each other and jump around. Turn around with the arrow keys, move around with the W, A, S, D keys, and shoot with Left click or the E button. Jump with Space. (Don't look down and shoot at the same time, you will respawn if you hit your self.)

!if you press the client ready button the game will most likely get stuck, then, you should click the quit button in the up right corner.
